W/ major risks ahead, including Brexit & turmoil in the Middle East, we need a solid plan to see continued progress on job-creation
However at 187,700, there are still far too many people unemployed, & we must redouble our efforts to continue the progress on job-creation
In recent years we have seen major progress in the jobs market, with the unemployment rate falling from over 15% to below 9%.
Only by delivering a strong economy can we provide the opportunity to deliver measures to support the creation of a better society.
At the core of everything we are trying to do is to build a strong economy so as to deliver a strong society.
